section.name: Contacts
section.p: The preferred way of getting in touch with one of the developers of JIntellitype is via the forums. Please direct any matters of general user support, questions, suggestions, discussions, etc., to the forums.

subsection.name: Developers and Contributors
subsection.p: In special cases, you may try to contact directly one of the developers or contributors. You can always send request to info@melloware.com also.
